summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3111 for the improvement of The Westerly Side of Taylor Avenue, from Harrison Street to Republican Street, all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 37861, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
